item.title: Guthan effects
item.dc:creator: @yurmoma1023 yurmoma1023
item.description:
@yurmoma1023 wrote:

Hi i am trying to get my full guthins to heal like 20% of damage player does when attacking,
this is the code i have:

[code]if((IsAttackingNPC || IsAttacking) && FullGuthanEquipped()) {
int chance = 0;
chance = misc.random(8);

if(chance == 3) {
playerLevel[3] += (hitDiff / 2);
sendMessage(“You drain the enemies health!”);
stillgfx(398, absY, absX);
}[/code]
Wat would i have to add to it?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 23, 2008, 10:56:13 PM[/size][hr]guess no one knows=\

Read full topic
